Jeff Noh / Sketches

These sketches are small explorations of new(-to-me) technologies, half-baked concepts, prototypes, unfinished work... some of which, with a bit of luck and care, will grow up into full fledged projects.

They're hosted around the web. Here, glitch/jnoh, and github/jnoh.

  • mt. wilson towercam bot
    a bot that tweets towercam images at sunrise and sunset
  • tinyap
    tiny, tiny implementation of ActivityPub
  • wavy
    lines slowly moving across a canvas in p5.js
  • flock
    murmurations in p5.js
  • particle system
    a p5.js particle system
  • p5.js template
    a starting point for p5.js sketches
